content_descriptors.notes: This game tells a fictional war story and as such there are occasional scenes of violence. There will be some blood and dead bodies, but no extreme gore or violence.

name: Fuchian Chronicles Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fuchian Chronicles is a choices matters story driven sci-fi JRPG with a selectable turn based combat system. Explore and fight in both ground and space settings as you follow the story of Kimi, a young cadet in the Galactic Fuchian Empire's navy, during a time of war with another civilization.
